title: Angry Video Game Nerd Adventures
notes: Otherwise seems OK but controller button mapping is completely screwed -> unplayable and remapping (xb360 controller) doesn't help because buttons are not recognized. Keyboard controls work as expected. Audio might be a little loud, maybe even distorted but I cannot recall how it was in Windows/Wine so..

title: Angry Video Game Nerd Adventures
notes: Native controller support works if you use Big Picture. Full-screen seems sketchy at times, throwing you back to windowed. Other than this, perfect
Game does not save progress. Can't get full screen to work. Otherwise runs smooth, gamepad works.
